title: The Silent feminists: America's first women directors
creator_contributor_role: Museum of the Moving Image (BFI), distributor

description: This is a history of women directors in Hollywood where, during the silent era, they had a greater presence. With the aid of interviews and film clips, pioneering women in Hollywood such as Alice Guy Blache, Lois Weber and Dorothy Arzner are remembered.
